This app demonstrates:

1. All parameters of `navset_pill_list`:
   - `id`: For tracking the selected panel
   - `selected`: Sets the initially selected panel
   - `header`: Adds a header above the navigation
   - `footer`: Adds a footer below the navigation
   - `well`: Adds a background behind the navigation list
   - `widths`: Controls the relative widths of the navigation list and content area

2. Different types of navigation elements:
   - Basic nav panels
   - A nav menu containing multiple panels
   - Panels with explicit values

3. A simple reactive display showing the currently selected panel

The app is minimal and focused solely on demonstrating the `navset_pill_list` functionality without unnecessary additional components.
## Preview the app on [Shinylive](https://shinylive.io/py/app/#h=0&--Fzv6Yg3Qw8R0OU7oLUt0Qrd9a3ESgIAeVgq2-XCzS-P8ZoAL7lGAWMALpAA)
